alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Rapid City; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued October 11 at 1:51AM MDT until October 12 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING... ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 6 PM MDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the first Wind Advisory, northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. For the second Wind Advisory, northwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...The Rapid City area, Jackson County and the Sturgis/Piedmont Foot Hills. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Pine Ridge Reservation. * WHEN...For the first Wind Advisory, from 11 AM this morning to 6 PM MDT this evening. For the second Wind Advisory, from 10 AM to 6 PM MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Sudden wind gusts can cause drivers to lose control, especially in lightweight or high profile vehicles. Strong winds can cause blowing dust, reduced visibility, and flying debris. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Combination of wind, low humidity, and dry fuels will result in elevated fire weather conditions.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Jackson; Rapid City; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills
